assn's endorsement is published in journal Circulation; some major teaching hospitals already put comatose cardiac arrest victims on ice, but many smaller ones do not; about 680 Americans a day who have heart attacks go into sudden cardiac arrest, in which heart stops beating and begins to fibrillate;
